Requirements

An arcade game inspired by all-time classics in which you guide a wisp
demi-god in his quest to redeem the souls of the corrupted wisps of a dark
forest. The game features random generated, labyrinth like levels, physics
based interactions, an ingenious control scheme and some religious satire
As a young wisp demi-god, your mission is to gather as many wisps as
possible in each level and redeem their souls, all against a time limit and
treacherous power-ups

Changelog
v1.0.4
- Up to 40% more frames per second, now runs acceptable on most integrated
chipsets
- Hit Alt  Enter to go into Ã¢â‚¬ËœWindowedÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ mode for up to 15% more performance

v1.0.3
- Re-enabled particles systems, previously disabled due performance issues
- Fixed a bug regarding a configuration file

v1.0.2
- Optimized textures and improved performance for low bandwidth cards
- Mouse sensitivity in Options easier to use
- Initial mouse sensitivity decreased  more user friendly

v1.0.1
- Fixed text errors in two of the tutorials
- Fixed a bug that was blocking mouse sensitivity and sounds volume sliders
in Options
